name: neptune
description: The farthest major planet in our solar system, a cold ice giant.

name: pluto
description: A dwarf planet in the Kuiper Belt with an eccentric orbit.

name: proxima_centauri
description: The closest star to the Sun, a red dwarf hosting an exoplanet.

name: vega
description: A bright white star in the constellation Lyra, part of the Summer Triangle.

name: betelgeuse
description: A red supergiant nearing the end of its life, famous for its size and brightness.

name: gaia_bh1
description: The closest known black hole to Earth, discovered by Gaia.

name: edge_milky_way
description: The approximate outer boundary of the Milky Wayâ€™s stellar disk.

name: andromeda
description: The nearest major galaxy to the Milky Way, on a slow collision course with us.

name: GW140915
description: The first gravitational wave source ever detected: two merging black holes.
